trans-unit.source: To sign up for a Blitline account
trans-unit.target: To sign up for a Blitline account

trans-unit.source: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).

trans-unit.source: In the lower pane of the management portal, click **New**.
trans-unit.target: In the lower pane of the management portal, click **New**.

trans-unit.source: ![command-bar-new][command-bar-new]
trans-unit.target: ![command-bar-new][command-bar-new]

trans-unit.source: Click **Store**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Store**.

trans-unit.source: ![blitline-store][blitline-store]
trans-unit.target: ![blitline-store][blitline-store]

trans-unit.source: In the **Choose an Add-on** dialog, select **Blitline** and click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: In the **Choose an Add-on** dialog, select **Blitline** and click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: In the **Personalize Add-on** dialog select the **Blitline** plan you want to sign up for.
trans-unit.target: In the **Personalize Add-on** dialog select the **Blitline** plan you want to sign up for.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name to identify your **Blitline** service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of **Blitline**.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name to identify your **Blitline** service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of **Blitline**.

trans-unit.source: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.
trans-unit.target: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.

trans-unit.source: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.
trans-unit.target: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.

trans-unit.source: ![store-screen-1][store-screen-1]
trans-unit.target: ![store-screen-1][store-screen-1]

trans-unit.source: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.
trans-unit.target: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.

trans-unit.source: Click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: Click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: On the **Review Purchase** tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.
trans-unit.target: On the **Review Purchase** tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.

trans-unit.source: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.
trans-unit.target: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.

trans-unit.source: After you click the check mark, your Blitline account will begin the provisioning process.
trans-unit.target: After you click the check mark, your Blitline account will begin the provisioning process.

trans-unit.source: To use Blitline you need to have your Application ID.
trans-unit.target: To use Blitline you need to have your Application ID.

trans-unit.source: To find your Blitline Application ID
trans-unit.target: To find your Blitline Application ID

trans-unit.source: Click **Connection Info**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Connection Info**.

trans-unit.source: ![blitline-connection-info-button][blitline-connection-info-button]
trans-unit.target: ![blitline-connection-info-button][blitline-connection-info-button]

trans-unit.source: In the *Connection info* dialog, you can see your Application ID
trans-unit.target: In the *Connection info* dialog, you can see your Application ID

trans-unit.source: ![blitline-connection-info][blitline-connection-info]
trans-unit.target: ![blitline-connection-info][blitline-connection-info]
